attributes.action: Don’t extradite Julian Assange to the United States.
attributes.background:
Wikileaks which Mr Assange edited made public a series of videos leaked by Chelsea Manning showing the deliberate killing of civilians by US troops.
Investigative journalism is an essential component of a healthy democracy and without it we are the poorer. This isn’t about the man but a principle.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can read more about the case here:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/world-affairs/europe/extradition-from-the-uk-what-next-for-julian-assange/
